"Crafting Timed Ability Data":
"You are able to construct a consumable item, \"Timed Ability Data\", that strengthens your capacity based on a recipe saved on the \"Data Drive\".

The constructed \"Timed Ability Data\" can be installed to your units from the \"\"Use\"\" command in your item menu.
